definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue

sentences.english: But external hemorrhoids usually resolve in a week or so.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，外痔引起的不适可在一周左右解除。

sentences.english: The majority of patients have vague abdominal pain or discomfort.
sentences.chinese: 多数患者有腹部的隐痛或不适。

sentences.english: The discomfort subsides gradually over one or two weeks, leaving the joint apparently normal, and pain-free.
sentences.chinese: 不适感会在一到两周内逐渐减弱，直到关节恢复正常。

sentences.english: This makes him some unwell, total can say the compel tallest, each moment guard opposition.
sentences.chinese: 这让他有些不适，总将武能提到最高，时刻提防。

sentences.english: As the night wears on, exhaustion overcomes their discomfort.
sentences.chinese: 随着夜色深沉，疲惫最终战胜了她们的不适。

sentences.english: I believe these behaviors are means of avoiding your own fears and discomfort.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这些行为是你避免自己的担心和不适感的方式。

sentences.english: And never take your vitamins on an empty stomach.
sentences.chinese: 也不要空腹吃维生素，这会让胃不适。

sentences.english: Once eat cherry attack discomfort, clearing away heat and toxic material available sugar cane juice.
sentences.chinese: 一旦吃多了樱桃发作不适，可用甘蔗汁清热解毒。

sentences.english: The impact goes far beyond mere sniffles and inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 影响决不仅仅是鼻塞或者不适那么简单。

sentences.english: Backache is one of the most common discomforts of pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 背痛是一种很常见的妊娠期不适症状。

sentences.english: It is inappropriate to advocate a "contest of attrition " for the Chinese Red Army today.
sentences.chinese: “拚消耗”的主张，对于中国红军来说是不适时宜的。

sentences.english: Different Brain Activation Patterns to Pain and Pain-related Unpleasantness during the Menstrual Cycle.
sentences.chinese: 月经期疼痛和疼痛相关的不适对脑区激活的不同模式。

sentences.english: While he points out that in our culture we feel very uncomfortable with the absence of words, with the absence of sound or noise.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，在我们文化中沉默，让人不适。

sentences.english: Then, catnip has been proven to be effective in cases of gastrointestinal discomfort.
sentences.chinese: 然后，猫已经被证明是有效的情况下胃肠不适。

sentences.english: The standard multi-year discount will cease to apply on 3 year orders only.
sentences.chinese: 标准多年折扣仅不适用于3年期订单。

sentences.english: Incompetents invariably make trouble for people other than themselves.
sentences.chinese: 不适任者只替他人制造麻烦而非自己。

definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
